title: THE PERFECT LOCATION — retreat to the shire and the bamboo forest
posting_body: Far from the madding crowd yet minutes away from it, your peaceful retreat is surrounded by bamboo and privacy.
Located on an eclectic and safe street midway between Telegraph and Shattuck avenues, it’s the PERFECT location for a working professional or graduate student.
it boasts off street private parking and is just a 10 minute walk to campus or BART and a 9 minute drive to the freeway.
A first floor unit in a charming 6-plex, it’s been recently renovated with fresh paint, new hardwood floors, stove and other amenities and is ready for move in by August 5.
First months rent, security deposit and credit/personal references required.
Lease is for  unfurnished unit but some furniture available for purchase if desired.
